title: VW's Skoda deliveries jump in February, best ever for that month
text: March 12, 2018 / 12:13 PM / Updated 24 minutes ago VW's Skoda deliveries jump in February, best ever for that month Reuters Staff 1 Min Read PRAGUE (Reuters) - Volkswagenâ€™s ( VOWG_p.DE ) Czech carmaker Skoda Auto posted a 14.3 percent rise in global deliveries in February, handing over 92,800 vehicles, the most ever in that month, it said on Monday. The logo of Skoda is seen during the 87th International Motor Show at Palexpo in Geneva, Switzerland March 8, 2017. REUTERS/Arnd Wiegmann Skoda said sales were driven by a 30.6 percent rise in China and 17.6 percent in Germany along with strong gains in Russia and Turkey. Reporting by Jason Hovet
